script.contentSelect: select JAVA_CLASS || '.' || JAVA_METHOD as SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=1 AND ALIAS_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND ALIAS_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND ALIAS_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select ALIAS_CATALOG as CATALOG_NAME, ALIAS_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, ALIAS_NAME as NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=1

script.contentSelect: select JAVA_CLASS || '.' || JAVA_METHOD as SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=2 AND ALIAS_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND ALIAS_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND ALIAS_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select ALIAS_CATALOG as CATALOG_NAME, ALIAS_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, ALIAS_NAME as NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=2

script.contentSelect: select SQL AS SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND TABLE_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND TABLE_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG_NAME, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_TYPE='TABLE'

script.contentSelect: select VIEW_DEFINITION AS SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS where TABLE_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND TABLE_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND TABLE_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG_NAME, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS

script.contentSelect: select SQL AS SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES where TABLE_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND TABLE_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND TABLE_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG_NAME, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES

script.contentSelect: select SQL AS SQL_CONTENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TRIGGERS where TRIGGER_CATALOG = :CATALOG_NAME AND TRIGGER_SCHEMA = :SCHEMA_NAME AND TRIGGER_NAME = :NAME
script.dataSelect: select TRIGGER_CATALOG AS CATALOG_NAME, TRIGGER_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA_NAME, TRIGGER_NAME AS NAME, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TRIGGERS
